alert.note: Alert for Blount Smoky Mountains; North Sevier; Sevier Smoky Mountains (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 09 at 5:24AM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Blount, southwestern Cocke and Sevier Counties through 715 AM EDT... At 623 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Pigeon Forge, or near Gatlinburg, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sevierville, Gatlinburg, Pigeon Forge, Smoky Mountains-Clingmans Dome, Smoky Mountains-Newfound Gap, Smoky Mountains-Fontana Area, Smoky Mountains-Balsam Mountain, Pittman Center, Townsend and Bird Crossing. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Blount Smoky Mountains; North Sevier; Sevier Smoky Mountains
